text: Volkmar Groß (31 January 1948 – 3 July 2014Trauer um Volkmar Groß HerthaBSC.de) was a German football player. He spent seven seasons in the Bundesliga with Hertha BSC, Tennis Borussia Berlin and FC Schalke 04. He represented Germany against Greece. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Footballers from Berlin
title: Volkmar Groß
